page.title: 17Sport in Wembley
page.content: We are very lucky in our area as we have easy access to some very good sports facilities. At{Vale Farm Sports Centre}there are 2 Swimming pools,one of which is for learners,an outdoor Stadium and running track,an indoor Sports hall with rooms for weight training and 10 squash courts. Near Wembley Stadium there is the { {National Squash Centre}where international matches are played. There is a running track in { {Alperton Sports Ground.} {Horsenden Hill}has a public 9-hole golf course and there is also a private 18-hole course belonging to { {Sudbury Golf Club.} A lot of people go fishing in the { {Grand Union }canal. { }There are many public parks for people to jog in.
